Name: Hentai Mosaique Puzzle
About the game: 'Mosaique Puzzle' is an puzzle game, where the goal is to get all the girls undressed. Match the pieces and unlock new stages. Each level with less and less clothing. No need to move pieces around, just rotate them! Plow your way trough all the mosaics. Use abilities to solve puzzle quicker, and level them up! All the girls notice what you do and comment on your progress. Game Features: • 30 Puzzles • 8 Girls • 5 Abilities • 100 Achievements • Navigation that enables close ups • Each stage gets more challenging • Don't ever get stuck! Use the sneak peak ability to uncover the missing pieces! • Optionally hide all the menus and just focus on the puzzle • Customize your settings, sound, navigation speed and such • Fast click on abilities to restore them quicker (The game shows naked breasts and genitals)
